alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:28PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Saline and central Pulaski Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 828 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Otter Creek, or near Southwest Little Rock, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... West Little Rock... Bryant... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Otter Creek... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... Chenal Valley... Alexander... Cammack Village... Baseline... War Memorial Stadium... The Heights... Hillcrest Neighborhood... Parkers-Iron Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
